scenario_text.value: Ah! I sense something there, Takuma.
Yeah? Let’s check it out, but be careful.

YIKES! Stop, lemme go! My meat’s all stringy,
you’d hate it!

Wait, what? Aren’t you all friends of Lady
Miu?
Oh thank the stars... I’m saved...

You’re all right now. Ah, that wound looks
painful. You should come with us.
